content: Is this another April fool?Am I the only one seeing this or its supposed to be a part of the newly created Nigerian board allocation for a merit source.Obviously, there have been many applications at least, I've seen that of Charles-Tim before hand and it's been pending consideration as a merit source but, I've not filled any application and still, I noted this minutes ago after trying to send some merit.How the hec am I having 572 Smerits?Am no merit source and am yet to apply for one but, that's what am seeing up there 572 Smerits! I don't get how it's happening except, I was just made a merit source @Theymos, its that you...? For the forum and Nigerian local board...I wouldn't want to rush or over do anything but, I'll be waiting on your responses and if someone else could have similar experience but, I think things would be a lot Crystal by tomorrow and maybe I'll run a merit thread for a start along with, doing more expenditions on reading/searching out merit deserving posts. In the mean time, I hold my peace!!!Edited:Meanwhile, I'll be looking forward to testing them Smerits later but for now, I am solely about understanding what possible scenarios that might result this, whats happening here and when its done, I'll see what to do with them merits.Users can drop quality posts on the sidelines if you may. You might refer to some of the existing merit threads by Ratimov for some rules. Can't go about quoting those now as I've got my hands full but, would surely apply them.
